### What documentation needs updating/creating?

Please provide a link to the specific section or describe where the documentation is needed.

### Why is this needed?

Explain why this documentation update is important or what problem it solves. (e.g., "The setup guide is outdated," "There's no explanation for X feature.")

### Proposed Content (Optional)

If you have a suggestion for the content, please include it here.

### Additional Context

Any other information relevant to this documentation request.
